h1: Salary vs Freelance Income Calculator – Compare Your Earnings
metaTitle: Salary vs Freelance Income Calculator – Compare Earnings
metaDescription: Use our Salary vs Freelance Income calculator to compare traditional salary with freelance income. Includes taxes and net pay. Quick and free.
intro: Making the decision to go freelance or remain an employee involves careful financial planning. This calculator helps you compare traditional salaried employment with freelance or self-employed income by factoring in different tax treatments, business expenses, and contribution requirements. Whether you're considering a career transition or just curious about the financial implications, this tool provides clear insights into which option might be more profitable for your situation.

ui.noResultsText: Enter your salary and freelance income details above to compare earnings

howSalaryVsFreelanceIncomeIsCalculated: This calculator compares traditional employee compensation with freelance income by applying different tax treatments. For employees: gross salary minus income tax and standard deductions equals net take-home pay. For freelancers: gross revenue minus business expenses, then minus self-employment tax and income tax equals net income. The difference shows which option provides higher net earnings.

example.scenario: Comparing $60,000 employee salary with $70,000 freelance revenue including $10,000 business expenses.
example.results: Employee Net Salary: $48,000 | Freelance Net Income: $52,000 | Difference: +$4,000 for freelancing

faqs.question: Can I include freelance business expenses?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can deduct legitimate business expenses from freelance revenue before calculating taxes.

faqs.question: Does it consider taxes for both salary and freelance income?
faqs.answer: Yes, it applies different tax treatments - employee income tax for salaried work and self-employment tax plus income tax for freelance work.

faqs.question: Can I calculate monthly and yearly income comparisons?
faqs.answer: Yes, the calculator shows both annual and monthly breakdowns for easy comparison and budgeting.

faqs.question: Is this calculator suitable for self-employed contractors?
faqs.answer: Yes, it works perfectly for contractors, consultants, and other self-employed individuals.

faqs.question: Is the salary vs freelance income calculator free?
faqs.answer: Yes, completely free with no registration required. All calculations are performed instantly in your browser.
